channel.title: Comments on: How Does Kuri Hear?
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Han - Not at this time. Thanks for asking.
item.content:encoded: Hi Han – Not at this time. Thanks for asking.

item.title: By: Han
item.dc:creator: Han
item.description: Will Kuri be compatible with Alexa in any way?
item.content:encoded: Will Kuri be compatible with Alexa in any way?

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi John - Great question! At this time, we don't have plans to integrate with Apple's home hub. However, we recommend subscribing to our email newsletter to be the first to hear if that ever changes. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi John – Great question! At this time, we don’t have plans to integrate with Apple’s home hub. However, we recommend subscribing to our email newsletter to be the first to hear if that ever changes. Thanks!

item.title: By: John Ashman-Wilkinson
item.dc:creator: John Ashman-Wilkinson
item.description: Hi will Kuri integrate with Apple home hub
item.content:encoded: Hi will Kuri integrate with Apple home hub

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Andrew - Kuri will integrate with IFTTT. From a quick Google search, it looks like IFTTT can integrate with Z-Wave to act as the go-between between your Kuri and smart home devices. For additional help, we recommend contacting our Kuri Experience team directly at support@heykuri.com. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi Andrew – Kuri will integrate with IFTTT. From a quick Google search, it looks like IFTTT can integrate with Z-Wave to act as the go-between between your Kuri and smart home devices. For additional help, we recommend contacting our Kuri Experience team directly at support@heykuri.com. Thanks!

item.title: By: Andrew Jones
item.dc:creator: Andrew Jones
item.description: Can Kuri communicate with Z-Wave home automation ?
item.content:encoded: Can Kuri communicate with Z-Wave home automation ?

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Michael - Great question. "Hey Kuri" is Kuri's wake word for each command. When you say, "Hey Kuri," Kuri's chest light will glow blue to show she's listening, and you can then state a single command like, "Go to the living room." Please let us know if you have any other questions.
item.content:encoded: Hi Michael – Great question. “Hey Kuri” is Kuri’s wake word for each command. When you say, “Hey Kuri,” Kuri’s chest light will glow blue to show she’s listening, and you can then state a single command like, “Go to the living room.” Please let us know if you have any other questions.

item.title: By: Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: Do we have to keep repeating 'Hey, Kuri" with every sentence, or will Kuri give its attention to is for a short while?
item.content:encoded: Do we have to keep repeating ‘Hey, Kuri” with every sentence, or will Kuri give its attention to is for a short while?
